eventDescription: Kubernetes Community Days Chennai 2025 is a community-organized conference supported by the Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF) to help grow and sustain the Kubernetes and cloud-native community in Chennai. It gathers adopters and technologists from open source and cloud-native communities for education, collaboration, and networking.
First Meetup of 2025 from JSLovers Chennai Chapter.
eventVenue: YuniQ, 4th Floor, Ticel Bio Park, Tharamani

eventDescription: The Global AI Bootcamp is an annual event that occurs worldwide, where developers and AI enthusiasts can learn about AI through workshops, sessions, and discussions. Local chapters of the Global AI Community host the events in various locations across the globe.
eventVenue: St Joseph's College Of Engineering Off, Old Mahabalipuram Road, Kamaraj Nagar, Semmancheri, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600119 · Chennai

eventDescription: First FOSS meetup of the FOSS United Pondicherry community!

eventName: The AI Connect (TAI) hosted by TSI Technologies
eventDescription: ​This full-day event is designed to immerse you in the latest AI trends, hands-on workshops, and insightful tech sessions led by industry experts. With interactive discussions, real-world applications, and networking opportunities, this is your chance to learn, connect, and innovate with fellow AI enthusiasts.
eventVenue: TSI Technologies Private Limited 4th Floor, Prestige Cosmopolitan 38, Sardar Patel Rd, Little Mount, Guindy, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600034, India
